Level 39
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 39
By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 05:54 am:

Stage 39

This stage is irritating. If you are a professional player, you can win this stage with 1 life, but if you want to play a fool with this stage, you will need 2 lives to win this stage.

Firstly, allow the psiroller(I've heard its called this) roll pass you. After that quickly run and go into the gap and create a box to prevent the psi roller from getting in.

With proper timing again, destroy the box on your left/beneath of you and rush down to obtain the key. If you want to make things easier, obtain the key and get killed by the psiroller, so you'll have less trouble later.

If you can pull it off, get the key than jump past the psiroller and quickly go back to the gap and block him out.

After that when your in the gap again, (once again it's hard for me to describe.......) destroy a box and block yourself in so as to allow the psirollers from the starting point as well as the other one to move back and forth. Soon if you are lucky, block those two out.

After that, you have left the last psiroller. Exit the gap you are formerly in and release the psiroller. Once it comes, it will move into the gap. Secure it, and head for the finishing point ^_^

By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 05:55 am:

For fun, you could see a crazy psiroller. Just lock it up tightly so that it has no space to move. That is a laugh. XD
